multidms documentation¶

multidms is a Python package written by the Matsen and Bloom labs. It can be used to fit single a global-epistasis model to one or more deep mutational scanning experiments, with the goal of estimating the effects of individual mutations, and how much the effects differ between experiments.

The source code is on GitHub.

See below for information and examples of how to use this package.
